description.p: SEEKING TOP PERFORMING SALES REPS. AVERAGE OR LAZY NEED NOT APPLY. We are an industry-leading Life Insurance Brokerage with TOP ROOKIES earning $200,000+ in 2023. Our QUALIFIED LEAD SYSTEM maximizes your time, with no need for cold calling, canvassing, or social media marketing. We offer a systemized sales process, a playbook-style presentation, and techniques to learn and replicate what works for other TOP agents.

This is a 1099, commission-only position with HIGH residual commissions in years 2+, and YOU OWN YOUR BOOK OF BUSINESS. We're looking for top talent to match our TOP leadership, systems, and culture in Charleston, SC.

ul.li: Meet with clients to discuss their life insurance needs after they have requested your help.
State life insurance license required, with a willingness to obtain if not already licensed.
Valid driver's license and reliable transportation are necessary.
Benefit from local support and extensive training for your professional growth.
Receive field training from top-producing agents to enhance your sales strategies.
Access diverse professional development opportunities, including boot camps, webinars, and team calls.
Work with top-quality carriers and utilize fresh, direct-mail leads to enhance your sales performance.
Advance through a clear, merit-based promotion system that rewards your hard work and achievements.
Enjoy flexible working hours and a supportive, family-like company culture.
Opportunities for incentive bonuses and exclusive trips based on performance.
Commission-based compensation as an independent contractor (1099), with significant bonuses for exceptional performance.
Competitive commission rates offered upfront and on policy renewals.
Enjoy the benefit of daily commission payments for a steady income flow.

description.p: Remote work flexibility is provided, enabling work-from-home arrangements as needed.

job.title: Sales Representative -- MJR130-Columbia

description.p: Life Insurance & Final Expense Sales: We are actively seeking a dedicated Sales Representative to join our Columbia, SC, team. This role focuses on consulting with clients to ensure they make informed decisions about their life insurance and final expense plans.

ul.li: Consult with clients to evaluate their life insurance needs and offer appropriate solutions.
Prospect and engage potential clients to increase our customer base.
Achieve and exceed sales targets within designated timeframes.
Respond to client inquiries and complaints, providing effective solutions.
Conduct follow-up appointments to maintain client engagement with new products and services.
Create and utilize sales materials to clearly articulate the benefits of our products to clients.
Prior experience in sales, customer service, or related fields is advantageous.
Proficiency with CRM platforms is desirable.
Strong ability to establish and maintain client relationships.
Excellent negotiation and communication skills.
Commitment to meeting deadlines and attention to detail.
State life insurance license is required, with readiness to obtain if not already licensed.
A valid driver's license and reliable transportation are essential.
Access to local support and comprehensive training programs to foster your success.
Field training from top producers to refine your sales tactics.
Diverse professional development opportunities, including boot camps, webinars, and team meetings.
Partnerships with leading insurance carriers and access to fresh, direct-mail leads to bolster your sales efforts.
A clear, merit-based promotion system to recognize and reward your hard work and accomplishments.
Flexible working hours to accommodate personal commitments.
A supportive, enjoyable, and family-oriented company culture.
Opportunities for incentive bonuses and exclusive trips based on performance.
This role is commission-based as an independent contractor (1099), with opportunities for significant bonuses for outstanding performance.
Competitive commission rates are offered upfront and on policy renewals.
Enjoy the benefit of daily commission payments to secure a steady income stream.

description.p: Remote work flexibility is provided, allowing for work-from-home arrangements as needed.

job.title: Sales Representative -- MJR130-MyrtleBeach

description.p: Life Insurance & Final Expense Sales: We're expanding our team in Myrtle Beach, SC, and looking for a Sales Representative passionate about helping clients with their life insurance and final expense needs. This role is key to providing clients with tailored solutions for their unique situations.

ul.li: Conduct meetings with clients to understand their life insurance needs and provide them with the best solutions.
Engage in proactive prospecting and client outreach to expand our reach.
Strive to meet and exceed sales targets within set deadlines.
Effectively handle client inquiries and concerns, offering timely and appropriate solutions.
Schedule follow-up appointments to keep clients updated on new products and services.
Utilize and develop sales materials to effectively showcase the benefits of our products.
Previous experience in sales, customer service, or related fields is preferred.
Familiarity with CRM platforms is an advantage.
Exceptional ability to build rapport with clients.
Strong negotiation and communication skills are essential.
Must be organized, detail-oriented, and deadline-driven.
A state life insurance license is required, and candidates must be willing to obtain this if not already licensed.
A valid driver's license and reliable transportation are mandatory.
Receive local support and comprehensive training to enhance your professional development.
Gain invaluable field training from top-producing agents to refine your sales techniques.
Access a variety of professional development opportunities, including boot camps, webinars, and team meetings.
Work with leading insurance carriers and benefit from fresh, direct-mail leads to support your sales initiatives.
Enjoy a clear, merit-based promotion system that rewards your achievements and hard work.
Flexible working hours are available to support a balanced lifestyle.
Thrive in a supportive, enjoyable, and family-oriented company culture.
Qualify for incentive bonuses and exclusive trips based on performance.
This role offers a commission-based pay structure as an independent contractor (1099), with opportunities for significant bonuses for top performers.
Competitive commission rates are provided upfront and on policy renewals.
Benefit from daily commission payments to ensure a steady income.

description.p: Remote work flexibility is available, allowing for work-from-home arrangements as necessary.
